snippet.title: POOLS - Chapters 2-3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2663530?utm_source=youtube
Website: https://poolsthegame.com
Patreon: https://patreon.com/Tensori
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/s3KMR2xZdY
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tensori.fi/
X: https://twitter.com/Tensori_ltd

Music from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/music/build-up-scenes-knock-knock-horror-creepy-scary-thriller-trailer-teaser-177239/

Explore. Get lost in a maze. Fear of not getting out. Hear something weird. Retain your sanity or embrace darkness. Stimulates your agoraphobia, nyctophobia and even claustrophobia. No monsters chasing you or jumping to your screen. A peaceful horror exploration game.

Calm and weird complex of swimming-pool rooms awaits exploration.

For others it can be very relaxing, but for others an intense experience.

POOLS is a psychological horror game, but it is not horror game like SCP, Amnesia, or Outlast. There are no monsters chasing you or jumping to your screen. Instead, weird architecture, sounds and visuals convey a tense atmosphere when appropriate. POOLS stimulates your agoraphobia, nyctophobia, and claustrophobia.

POOLS is more inspired by the ethereal vibes of Anemoiapolis. An atmospheric adventure through veiled mysteries. The known and the unknown join as one.
